articles.title: Singapore court jails maid for abusing 76-year-old bedridden woman - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): A domestic worker who was stressed by her workload took it out on the elderly bedridden woman she was employed to care for by abusing her.

articles.title: China Evergrande Debt Restructuring Looms - Bloomberg Markets and Finance
articles.description: The long-awaited debt restructuring of embattled developer China Evergrande Group may finally be at hand. Stephen Engle reports on "Bloomberg Daybreak: Asia."
